message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I think it's a fair price considering its value.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $13,000 for the product.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm looking for a little closer to $13,500.  Would that work for you?
I appreciate your counteroffer, Alice. Considering the value of the product and my budget, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $13,200.
